Uses of Class
controller.Controller

Packages that use Controller
gui Contains the application's graphical user interface. 
model Contains the circuit model and implements logic for running the simulation.

          Constructs a new Gui frame.
 

Uses of Controller in model

          Constructs a new empty Model object.

          Constructs a new Model object, loading the model data from a file.
